Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class TargetCells

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.TargetCells
public class TargetCells
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a set of cells that are targeted for actions. A TargetCells instance should be created either via the fromMatrix() method or via constructor. The instance should then be modified via the setPosition, setRow, setColumn methods. Finally the Cell instances should be retrieved by the getTargets() method in the board.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      This method checks if the TargetCells has any cell set to be targeted
      Returns:
      false if there are targeted cells, true otherwise

    • setAllTargets

      public TargetCells setAllTargets​(boolean isTargeted)
      This method sets all cells to the same value
      Parameters:
      isTargeted - if true, sets all cells to targeted. Otherwise, if false sets all cells to un-targeted
      Returns:
      resulting TargetCells

      Parameters:
      x - the x coord
      y - the y coord
      isTargeted - if true the cell is set to targeted, otherwise to un-targeted

      resulting TargetCells

    • getPosition

      public boolean getPosition​(int x, int y)
      Retrieves the targeted status of the cell at a given position
      Parameters:
      x - int representing the x coord of the cell to be checked
      y - int representing the y coord of the cell to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the cell is targeted, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • intersect

      public TargetCells intersect​(TargetCells other)
      Sets this to be the intersection of this and other. Cells in this after the method call with be targeted if and only if they were previously targeted and if they are targeted by other
      Parameters:
      other - the other TargetCells instances with which apply the intersection
      Returns:
      resulting TargetCells

    • invert

      public TargetCells invert()
      This method inverts each cell's targeted status. i.e. a targeted cell becomes untargeted and viceversa
      Returns:
      the resulting TargetCells

    • union

      public TargetCells union​(TargetCells other)
      Sets this to be the union of this and other. Cells in this after the method call with be targeted either if they were previously targeted or if they are targeted by other
      Parameters:
      other - the other TargetCells instances with which apply the union
      Returns:
      resulting TargetCells

    • fromCellAndRadius

      public static TargetCells fromCellAndRadius​(Cell center, int radius) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Factory method which creates a new TargetCells that sets to targeted all the cells around the center with Manhattan distance of radius. This operation excludes the center itself.
      Parameters:
      center - The center cell of the targeted area
      radius - The Manhattan distance around the center at which all cells will be targeted, excluding the center.
      Returns:
      the resulting TargetCells
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the radius is non-positive

    • fromMatrix

      public static TargetCells fromMatrix​(boolean[][] source) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Factory method to create a TargetCells method from a boolean matrix
      Parameters:
      source - the matrix from which to build the TargetCells instance
      Returns:
      resulting TargetCells
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if source is of invalid size

    • fromCells

      public static TargetCells fromCells​(java.util.Collection<Cell> cells)
      Factory method to create a TargetCells method from a collection of cells.
      Parameters:
      cells - the cells whose positions will be marked as targeted
      Returns:
      resulting TargetCells
